abstract: Zach Parise, the captain of the New Jersey Devils, says his knee feels good going into the N.H.L. season.
snippet: Zach Parise, the captain of the New Jersey Devils, says his knee feels good going into the N.H.L. season.
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise was named captain of the Devils on Wednesday; that was the easy part. In this interview, Parise discusses his comeback this season after surgery for a torn meniscus in his knee and his approach to handling questions about being in the final year of his contract.

headline.main: Parise on His Contract Status, His Knee and Batting Practice
